activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12767
activity.text:
Can I please have this issue assigned to me?

**Solution:**
Add navigate in onValueChange function when user selects the tab and navigate with the respective mode to change the URL so its in sync with the selected tab.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12767
activity.text: Login tab switching doesn't update browser URL mode parameter
